name: Joyce Lynn McKAY, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
LARSEN, J., dissents and would reach the merits.
parties: Joyce Lynn McKAY, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted. 52 Pa.Cmwlth. 24, 415 A.2d 910.
LARSEN, J., dissents and would reach the merits.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Lawrence H. Rudnick, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Harold Cramer, Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
452 A.2d 1019
Joyce Lynn McKAY, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 19, 1982.
Decided Dec. 10, 1982.
Lawrence H. Rudnick, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Harold Cramer, Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
